name: P9ML Neural Membrane Computing
description: P-system membranes with P9ML neural integration, tensor processing, and cognitive grammar kernel

parentMembrane.description: Parent membrane ID for nested hierarchies (empty for root membrane)

enableScheme.description: Install Scheme interpreter for hypergraph representation

enableMonitoring.description: Enable event monitoring and rule execution engine

enableP9ML.description: Enable P9ML neural tensor integration with ggml

enableQuantization.description: Enable data-free quantization-aware training for neural membranes

tensorDimensions.description: Default tensor dimensions for membrane state representation

cognitiveKernel.description: Enable cognitive grammar kernel with hypergraph processing

namespaceRegistry.description: Enable distributed namespace registration for global state management
